item.title: 中国承诺日本民用贸易不受最新限制措施影响
item.description: 中国试图向日本企业保证，其最新的出口管制措施具有明确的针对性，并表示旨在限制军事应用的管制措施不会影响民用用途。【原文：China sought to reassure Japanese businesses that its latest export controls are narrowly targeted, saying that civilian use will remain unaffected by curbs intended to limit military applications.】

item.title: 玛莎百货加速实施转型计划以助其从网络攻击中恢复
item.description: 玛莎百货公司表示正加速实施转型计划，并维持盈利预期不变。这家英国零售商正努力从去年四月的网络攻击中恢复元气。【原文：Marks & Spencer Plc said it is accelerating its turnaround plan and maintained its profit guidance as the British retailer seeks to recover from last April’s cyberattack.】

item.title: 泰国黄金交易商计划推行美元计价交易以抑制泰铢升值
item.description: 泰国最大黄金交易商计划推广美元计价交易，旨在削弱黄金对本国货币的影响力，并规避惩罚性税收的威胁。【原文：Thailand’s largest gold traders plan to promote dollar-denominated transactions, aiming to weaken the metal’s influence on the local currency and head off the threat of a punitive tax.】

item.title: 美国宇航局考虑因医疗紧急情况提前结束太空任务
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局正考虑提前结束国际空间站上的一项任务，此前一名宇航员突发医疗紧急状况。【原文：NASA is considering ending a mission on board the International Space Station early after an astronaut suffered a medical emergency.】

item.title: AB食品公司警告称，因Primark业绩疲软及食品销售下滑，公司利润将受影响
item.description: 联合英国食品公司警告称，受Primark销售疲软及食品业务表现参差不齐的影响，本财年利润将低于预期。【原文：Associated British Foods Plc warned that profit will be lower than expected this fiscal year, hit by weaker Primark sales and a mixed performance in its food business.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀率时隔五个月首次回升
item.description: 瑞士通胀率上月出现自7月以来的首次上升，缓解了瑞士国家银行重新实施负利率的压力。【原文：Swiss inflation ticked up last month for the first time since July, easing pressure on the Swiss National Bank to reintroduce negative interest rates.】

item.title: 中国最快将于本季度批准英伟达H200采购申请
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国计划最早在本季度批准部分英伟达H200芯片进口，这将使该公司重新获得进入关键市场的机会。【原文：China plans to approve some imports of Nvidia Corp.’s H200 chips as soon as this quarter, according to people familiar with the situation, giving the company renewed access to a critical market.】

item.title: 乐购假日销售增长推动利润达预期上限
item.description: 乐购公司表示，由于关键的圣诞节期间销售强劲，本财年利润预计将达到预测区间的上限。【原文：Tesco Plc said profit for this financial year will likely be at the upper end of its forecast after strong sales during the crucial Christmas period.】

item.title: 瑞典通胀率保持稳定，瑞典央行暂停加息的理由依然成立
item.description: 瑞典12月核心通胀率有所回落，这可能使该国央行得以维持其在未来一年内保持借贷成本不变的计划。【原文：Sweden’s core inflation eased in December, likely allowing the country’s central bank to keep its plan for unchanged borrowing costs over the coming year.】

item.title: 壳牌石油交易业绩疲软，为动荡的一年画上句号
item.description: 壳牌公司表示，由于原油价格暴跌，其第四季度石油贸易业绩显著恶化。【原文：Shell Plc said its oil trading performance significantly worsened in the fourth quarter as crude prices slumped.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯称英国房价创2023年8月以来最大跌幅
item.description: 英国抵押贷款机构数据显示，去年12月英国房价跌幅创近两年半以来最大，表明工党增税预算案令购房者望而却步。【原文：UK house prices dropped at the sharpest rate in almost two-and-a-half years in December, according to figures from a mortgage lender that suggested Labour’s tax-raising budget discouraged aspiring buyers.】

item.title: 德国工厂订单创一年来最大增幅，显示经济复苏迹象
item.description: 德国工厂订单在11月意外实现连续第三个月增长，表明欧洲最大经济体的复苏势头正在稳固。【原文：German factory orders unexpectedly rose for a third month in November, suggesting that a recovery is taking hold in Europe’s largest economy.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉旗下莫维公司与加尔普探讨伊比利亚半岛下游业务合作
item.description: 加尔普能源公司表示，正与西班牙莫维公司的所有者就可能合并双方在伊比利亚半岛的下游资产进行初步讨论。【原文：Galp Energia SGPS SA said it’s holding early discussions with the owners of Spain’s Moeve about a possible combination of their downstream assets in Iberia.】

item.title: 印尼财政赤字飙升至GDP的2.9%，逼近法定上限
item.description: 印尼财政赤字达到至少二十年来最高水平（疫情期间除外），在总统普拉博沃·苏比安托执政的第一个完整年度内，该赤字已逼近国内生产总值3%的法定上限。【原文：Indonesia’s fiscal deficit hit the highest level in at least two decades, outside of the pandemic, approaching the legal cap of 3% of gross domestic product in President Prabowo Subianto’s first full year in power.】

item.title: 富时100指数连续第二日下跌
KKR为第二只亚洲私募信贷基金筹集25亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，KKR & Co.于去年12月下旬完成了其第二只专注亚洲市场的信贷基金的募集，最终获得25亿美元的总投资额。【原文：KKR & Co. closed its second Asia-focused credit fund late December, securing $2.5 billion in total investments, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据称，新加坡联合利华将于三月寻求7亿美元的新加坡首次公开募股
item.description: 知情人士透露，UI宝盛房地产投资信托基金正筹备最早于3月在新加坡上市，目标募集资金至少9亿新元（7亿美元）。【原文：UI Boustead REIT is gearing up for a listing in Singapore as early as March, targeting proceeds of at least S$900 million ($700 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对富人加税可能适得其反，英国财政大臣里夫斯需警惕
item.description: 英国最富裕的家庭正遭受个人财务状况急剧恶化的冲击，税收增加与薪资增长乏力正威胁着这个国家消费经济的关键驱动力。【原文：Britain’s most affluent families have been hit by a sharp downturn in their personal finances, with higher taxes and sluggish pay threatening to stunt a crucial driver of the country’s consumer economy.】

item.title: 硅谷幕后推手Index Ventures着眼于继任计划
item.description:
在刚刚度过投资业绩辉煌的一年后，这家诞生于日内瓦的风险投资公司正着手培养新一代领导者。

【原文：

Fresh off a banner year of investments, the Geneva-born venture capital firm is now priming a new generation of leaders. 

】

item.title: 标普称人工智能与国防开支将加剧全球铜供应紧张
item.description: 标普全球最新研究显示，随着人工智能竞赛的加剧和国防开支的激增，铜短缺问题预计将进一步加剧。由于生产商难以扩大产能，铜供应缺口可能持续扩大。【原文：The race for artificial intelligence and surging defense spending are set to intensify a projected shortage of copper as producers struggle to expand, according to a new study by S&P Global.】

item.title: 首尔公寓价格在韩国央行会议前持续上涨
item.description: 韩国首都公寓价格连续第49周上涨，这进一步强化了央行在下周董事会会议上维持政策利率不变的理由。【原文：Apartment prices in South Korea’s capital posted gains for a 49th straight week, reinforcing the case for the central bank to keep its policy rate unchanged when the board meets next week.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行黄金储备在2025年激增70%创历史新高
item.description: 随着金价飙升，菲律宾央行黄金储备价值去年激增近70%，创下历史新高。【原文：The value of the Philippine central bank’s gold holdings surged almost 70% last year to a record high as the metal jumped.】

item.title: 澳大利亚国债因鸽派利率预期上涨，美国国债亦走高
item.description: 澳大利亚国债价格上涨，受隔夜美国国债价格上涨以及市场对央行抗通胀言论的鸽派解读提振。【原文：Australian bonds rallied, lifted by an overnight rise in Treasuries and a dovish interpretation of central bank comments on its fight against inflation.】

item.title: K现在意味着把私募股权赶出家门
item.description:
不平等中蕴藏着机遇。同时，一场选举也即将到来。

【原文：

There’s opportunity in inequality. There’s also an election coming up.

】

item.title: 住友能源部门或将在新加坡设立液化天然气交易台
item.description: 住友商事旗下能源贸易部门正考虑在新加坡设立液化天然气交易台，这是这家日本企业为巩固其在海运燃料市场地位所采取的最新举措。【原文：The energy trading arm of Sumitomo Corp. is considering setting up an LNG desk in Singapore, the latest move by the Japanese company to strengthen its foothold in the seaborne market for the fuel.】

item.title: 中国茶饮连锁品牌茶吉传闻正筹备香港上市
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国茶饮连锁品牌茶吉控股有限公司正考虑在香港上市，加入众多企业争相在亚洲金融中心发售股票的行列。【原文：Chinese tea chain Chagee Holdings Ltd. is considering a listing in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter, joining a rush of firms being drawn to sell shares in the Asian financial hub.】

item.title: 中国以创纪录的国债发行速度开启2026年
item.description: 中国以创纪录的政府债券发行量开启新年，令本就需求疲软的市场倍感压力。【原文：China is starting the year with a record clip of government bond issuance, rattling a market where demand is already weak.】

item.title: 京东考虑通过首次点心债券发行筹集14亿美元
item.description: 知情人士透露，京东集团正考虑首次发行点心债，拟筹资约100亿元人民币（合14亿美元）。随着竞争加剧，京东加入了众多寻求锁定低成本融资的中国电商企业行列。【原文：JD.com Inc. is considering its first dim sum bond sale, with a potential offering that could raise about 10 billion yuan ($1.4 billion), according to people familiar with the matter, joining a slew of Chinese e-commerce companies looking to lock in cheap funding as competition intensifies.】

item.title: 日本30年期国债发行需求低于12个月平均水平
item.description: 日本周四举行的30年期政府债券拍卖中，需求低于过去12个月的平均水平，因财政担忧抑制了投资者的购买意愿。【原文：Japan’s 30-year government bond auction Thursday saw demand that was weaker than the 12-month average as fiscal concerns weighed on investor appetite.】

item.title: 亿万富翁对冲基金经理迈克尔·普拉特投资英国生物技术公司Engitix
item.description: 英国生物技术公司Engitix Ltd.从亿万富翁迈克尔·普拉特处再获2500万美元融资，用于推进其癌症和纤维化治疗方案的研发。【原文：UK-based biotechnology company Engitix Ltd. has raised a further $25 million from billionaire Michael Platt to help develop its therapies for cancer and fibrosis.】
